actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A joint resolution to rescind certain budget authority recommended in the message of the President of November 29, 1975 (H. Doc. 94-311), transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Rescinds appropriations in the amount of $5,225,000, provided to the Consumer Product Safety Commission pursuant to the Independent Agencies Appropriation Act.

titles.title: A joint resolution to rescind certain budget authority recommended in the message of the President of November 29, 1975 (H. Doc. 94-311), transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
